values.title: keep it simple
values.description: over-complication breeds a lot of entropy

values.title: good design starts from the top
values.description: a code base, website, or team are only as good as their architecture, so make it solid from the start

values.title: do it once
values.description: if you have to do something more than once it's probably time to abstract some work away

values.title: keep on swimming
values.description: there is always more to learn and explore
